name: Bru Lima
remarks: Bru was found dead by his mother when she returned from work. A suicide note was found in the house.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The bodies of two unidentified trans women were found in Belo Horizonte. The causes of their deaths are unknown.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The bodies of two unidentified trans women were found in Belo Horizonte. The causes of their deaths are unknown.

name: Selena
remarks: Selena was a young trans woman and was murdered in her own residence. There are not witnesses or arrested for this crime.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was found dead in Manaus. Their cause of death is unknown.

name: Michele
remarks: Michelle was shot in the neck by her partner after she tried to end their relationship. Local activists called the police after finding her body on the floor of her home. Police state that she died as a result of domestic violence and feminicide. Her partner was abusive and in the past she had applied for judicial protective measures in the past.

name: P.H.P. de Souza
remarks: P. was found naked from the waist down on a side road. She had been stabbed in the left side of her abdomen and shot in the head.

name: Bragly Ordoñez
remarks: Bragly was stabbed by the partner of another trans woman after she discovered he had had an affair with Bragly. She died in hospital 8 days later.

name: D. E. Contreras Rodríguez
remarks: The victim's body was found by two walkers hanging from a tree in the National Park of Bogotá. Her throat had been cut.

name: J.C. da Silva
remarks: J. was shot dead in the city of Cajueiro on a Friday night. The exact circumstances of her death are not known.

name: Bruna Rodriguez
remarks: Bruna was stabbed.

name: Romina Vargas Florentín
remarks: Romina was stabbed in the chest by a man who approached her while she was working in the street. Police patrolling the area found her lying on the ground injured. She died on the way to hospital. Her murderer was apprehended by police and has confessed to the crime. According to the information released he had previously attacked another trans woman on 3rd October. Like many trans women in Latin America, she had become a sex worker by necessity as a result of being unable to find work because of her gender identity.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was strangled. No other information is known.

name: Nega Maradona
remarks: Nega was shot at around 3pm in the afternoon. According to witnesses their killers made them kneel and then shot them in the head.

name: Azul Montoro ("Blue")
remarks: Azul was stabbed 18 times in the neck, chest and back. Alejandro Casiva was arrested after her mobile phone was found in his possession.

name: Beatriz Presley ("Bia")
remarks: Bia's body was found by relatives lying on a bed in her home in the morning of Wednesday 18th October. She had been seen alive only the previous weekend.The cause of her death is unknown but one of the news reports suggests suicide.

name: Fernando Lino da Silva
remarks: Fernando was watching TV when two hooded men entered his house and shot him.

name: Nathália dos Santos
remarks: Nathália was shot 4 times in the back in the early hours of the morning. CCTV footage showed she was running away from her attacker.

name: Barbara Mendes
remarks: Barbara was shot by a client as she tried to run away. He gave chase and shot her again before fleeing. She died at the scene.

name: Xiomy Artunduaga
remarks: Xiomy was stabbed in the chest during a fight with another trans woman who was also a sex worker. Like far too many trans people her family did not accept her.

name: Hajira/Warra
remarks: Hajira body was found brutally murdered and initially unidentified in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa on the morning of Saturday 21st October. When found the condition of her body suggested she had died two or three days earlier. Her injuries also suggested that she had been tortured. Her body was refused entry to a local freezer for fear of contamination and a government contractor has refused to bury the body.

name: Stephanie Montez
remarks: Stephanie was shot in the chest, abdomen, and shoulder. Four people (Jace Montange, Cedric Green, Randy Dorsey and Chloe Huehlefeld) have been charged in connection with her murder.

name: Stefany Tablante
remarks: Stefany was stabbed 23 times by a client following an argument. She died at the scene.

name: Veronica Alves
remarks: Veronica was shot several times from a passing vehicle after refusing a man who wanted to pay her for sex. She worked in a hair salon and was drinking with friends at a bar when the man approached her.

name: M. Diaz Delgado
remarks: M. was found dead with a stab wound in her neck at her home early on the morning of Sunday 22nd October.

name: L. Guillen Rojas
remarks: L. was shot multiple times on the street next to a basketball court. She was originally from Acapulco.

name: Priscila Vasconcelos
remarks: Priscila was found dead at dawn next to a petrol station. According to the police she had a head injury.

name: Alessandra Rinaldi
remarks: Alessandra died by suicide. No other information is known.

name: Nayanne Rayalla ("Naay")
remarks: Naay was stabbed during a fight with her aunt. She died at the scene.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was found with a head injury.

name: Candace Towns
remarks: Candace was found shot to death at the top of a driveway.

name: Niely Lafontayne
remarks: Niely was shot in the face and abdomen by two assailants on a motorcycle. As she lay dying they robbed her.

name: Jiratchaya Kampoon
remarks: Jiratchaya died from brain asphyxia after a lung collapsed during a botched breast enhancement operation by an unlicenced surgeon. The surgeon (who was operating out of a legitimate-looking clinic) has been arrested and charged with manslaughter.

name: Giseli Tavares
remarks: Giseli was shot by two men on a motorcycle who intercepted her vehicle and ordered the other passengers out before shooting her. Giseli had just visited a friend in Igarassu prison in Itapissuma. She had left the prison four days earlier.

name: M. B. da Silva Dias
remarks: M. was stabbed in the face and neck. Her mother refused to accept her gender identity and had thrown her out of her home two months earlier. A month later she had started trying to support herself through sex work.

name: Barbara
remarks: Barbara was reportedly killed by one person.

name: Luna
remarks: Luna was reportedly one of three trans women murdered by a criminal gang.

name: Braniyela
remarks: Braniyela was reportedly one of three trans women murdered by a criminal gang.

name: Sucy
remarks: Sucy was reportedly one of three trans women murdered by a criminal gang.

name: Mitzi
remarks: Mitzi and several other people were killed by an armed gang.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: Neighbors found the victim's body inside a plastic bag, floating in a sewage canal, and gave notice to the police

name: Eduarda Fernanda Cordeiro
remarks: Eduarda was found in a ditch near the city cemetery. Her head wounds suggested she was beaten to death.

name: Nicolly Carvalho
remarks: Nicolly was shot in the back. Her body was found about 50 meters from a waterfall in the rural district of Peirópolis.

name: Natalie Nguyen
remarks: Natalie was hit by a car after leaving a suicide note. In death, her family erased her identity.

name: Shalom de Souza ("La Valentine")
remarks: Shalom was found face down on a bed with a sack on her head and bleeding from her anus. The cause of her death has not yet been confirmed by the police.

name: Wander Pérez
remarks: Wander was beaten to death, apparently during an argument over a payment of 100 pesos (about $2).

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was shot in the street at 10am on Monday 6th November in the El Jibarito neighborhood. Her identity is unknown.

name: Petherson Santos
remarks: Petherson was not trans himself, but was beaten to death while defending his sister Lorena, who is transgender. The crime occurred in a square while Lorena was sitting on a bench using the public wi-fi. The suspect rode up to her and threatened to throw his bike on her. When her brother intervened the two argued and Petherson was beaten. Lorena herself escaped unscathed, but Petherson died at the scene. Luiz Carlos da Silva Mariano (18) has been arrested for the killing.

name: Laura Ursaru
remarks: Laura was stabbed in the chest in a tourist park in the EUR district of Rome on Friday 10th November. A 35 year old suspect has been arrested. He is also accused of stabbing a Moroccan man to death 12 hours later.

name: Jennifer Lopez Ramos Gámez
remarks: Jennifer was one of 3 people whose decomposing bodies were found  on the banks of a swamp. Their bodies had signs of torture and their hands were tied. They had last been seen alive on Sunday 6th November.

name: Macumba
remarks: Macumba was run-over by vehicle. The perpetrator fled.

name: Joan Thabeng
remarks: Joan's body was found in the early hours of the morning several hours after receiving a call asking her to visit her boyfriend. Her body had been dragged though the streets and dumped. She was buried on 18th November, following a memorial service two days earlier attended by friends, family and LGBTI activists. A suspect has been identified but not yet arrested.

name: María Luisa Velásquez Zúniga
remarks: Maria was found dead in her home. She had been stabbed several times in the head and chest. Nestor Adalí Troches Orellana has been arrested for her murder.

name: Carlos Brandão
remarks: Carlos died from malnutrition after suffering neglect and ill-treatment in the hospital where he had been since being beaten on his way to work in early August. His sister Elen reported his treatment and eventually managed to get him transferred, but he died 5 days later.

name: Fernanda Santos
remarks: Fernanda was shot to death - reportedly in or around the right shoulder. No other information is known.

name: Angelina Miranda
remarks: Angelina was murdered by two people, for no apparent reason.

name: Shanaia
remarks: Shanaia was shot 12 times.

name: Vitória de Souza ("Iris")
remarks: Vitória was stabbed 9 times in the chest, back, neck and right arm. Witnesses had reported hearing an argument involving her and another person at around 4:30am. Tyre marks were found on the grass near her body.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was found dead inside a room she was renting from a woman who lived with her children in the same building. She had been shot four times. Neighbours reported hearing gunshots during the night, and 9mm shell casings were found at the scene.

name: Julia Zuñiga Padilla
remarks: Victim was shot.

name: S. A. Sánchez López
remarks: S. A. was a deaf person who reported being beating for no apparent reason.

name: L. de Souza Pereira
remarks: L. was dragged from her house and beaten to death with a piece of wood in the street. Neighbours who found her body saw a group of unidentified men fleeing the scene of the murder.

name: Kendrika Itzel D Espino
remarks: Kendrika's death was reported via Facebook. The cause of her death is unknown.

name: Damaris Becerra Jurado
remarks:
Damaris died in custody in the early hours of 26th November in Penitentiary Unit No. 32 of Florencio Varela. She suffered from a chronic illness and had been detained without charge two and a half years earlier, along with six others who remain in prison.

Her death was the fourth of a trans woman in confinement in the same city in a year, following those of Pamela Macedo Panduro, Angie Velázquez Ramírez and Brandy Bardales Sangama. All were Peruvian migrants and Otrans activists. Otrans reports that in the city the police routinely make arbitrary arrests of trans women. The detainees are routinely held without charge for long periods in degrading conditions without access to healthcare.

name: Spogmai
remarks: Spogmai was shot 6 times in her apartment. She died in hospital. The 24-year-old was described by friends as a vibrant and happy soul and was originally from Balochistan. She had come to the region hoping for a better life. It is common for Pakistani trans women to assume one name after being disavowed after transition by their biological family. Spogmai is an Islamic name meaning "Moon of Paradise".

name: Veronica Carvajal
remarks: Veronica was strangled by her partner after an argument over money.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim died as a result of a cosmetic silcone injection - a common procedure among young women in Latin America.

name: E. G. Sarat
remarks: E. was found dead with a gunshot wound to the back of the head in a house in Xela on 27th November.

name: Brooklyn BreYanna Stevenson
remarks: Brooklyn was found dead in a motel room after Oklahoma City police responded to a disturbance. On 21st December, Brandon Michael Tyson (31) was arrested and charged with her murder.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was shot. No other information is known.

name: Júlia Volp
remarks:
Júlia's body was found with a chest wound in undergrowth in the early afternoon of 4th December. She had been missing since 29th November. According to Júlia's boyfriend she worked with online e-commerce, but had traveled to Florianópolis to raise money through sex work to fulfill her dream of moving to Italy. She had already been deported by from Italy once after an agency let her down and was working to raise money to return.

Júlia had come out as trans at the age of 12, and began her transition at 15. Like many trans women in Brazil she still had documentation in her birth name, but had started the process of correcting this with the help of a lawyer. Unlike many, she had the full support of her family.

name: Alloura Wells
remarks: Alloura disappeared on 15th July 2017, but was not reported missing by her family until 5th November. Her body was identified on 30th November. On 5th August the decomposed body of an unidentified transgender woman was found in a ravine by a woman out walking with a friend. After community pressure Toronto police finally used DNA analysis to identify the body on 30th November. The results confirmed that the remains belonged to Alloura Wells, but her cause of death was ruled "undetermined."

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The body was found floating in a river. The note reports that it was a homocide.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: A report by the organization "Soy Humano" provides crime data. This record represents one of the murders mentioned.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: A report by the organization "Soy Humano" provides crime data. This record represents one of the murders mentioned.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: A report by the organization "Soy Humano" provides crime data. This record represents one of the murders mentioned.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: A report by the organization "Soy Humano" provides crime data. This record represents one of the murders mentioned.

name: Sandra
remarks: Sandra's body was found by her sister after she had not heard from her for two days.

name: Milena
remarks: Milena's body was found facedown with trauma to the head. She had been stabbed and/or stoned.

name: Flávia Luiza
remarks: Flávia died on board a flight from São Paulo to Paris. Her death may not have been suspicious, but she reportedly suffered from respiratory problems which may have been a result of her situation back in Brazil. It is worth noting that respiratory conditions can arise as a symptom of industrial silicone poisoning, so her death may well have been a result of a cosmedic procedure back in Brazil.

name: Andressa Xoda
remarks: Xoda was shot in the back and head in the early evening.

name: Eduarda Figueiredo
remarks: Eduarda was shot in the face while working on the street in the early hours of the morning.

name: Kyara Barbosa
remarks: Kyara died by suicide. According to friends she suffered from severe depression. She was politically active and a skilled writer who had written messages about the difficult lives of Brazilian transgender people.

name: Sasha Alister Patterson
remarks: Sasha was in a park when two men approached her and shot her multiple times. Her body was found in a pile of garbage.

name: Jessica Dimy
remarks: Jessica died in hospital from a cardiac arrest four months after suffering a transphobic attack. On 28th July Jessica was raped by Fábio Barreto da Silva (23) who attempted to strangle her, wrapped her unconscious body in a sheet, doused it in alcohol and then started a fire. Other guests saw smoke in the hallways and called the police but by the time she was found she had burns covering 50% of her body.

name: Sabrina
remarks: Sabrina's body was found in a shack next to the Uberaba mall, in a place known as a drug users' spot. Her cause of death is unknown but there were no obvious signs of violence.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The deceased was killed in a knife fight with another tenant with whom she had a feud. Both worked in the same bar. The antagonist was transferred to the Herrejón Hospital with a head wound. The police expected her to recover and intended to take a statement about the events leading up to the death.

name: Luany Aquamarine
remarks: Luany was beaten by a group of men. She was taken to hospital, where she died several days later.

name: Geraldine Contreras
remarks: Geraldine was executed and her body found on a road. Reportedly she was travelling with a man whose whereabouts are unknown.

name: Luna Shine
remarks: Luna was killed in her home by a client. According to witnesses, he was with her in her home until about 6pm. Sometime after he left he returned with another man and stabbed her. Her killer was restrained by local people who called the police, but the other suspect escaped. The killer's car (which had been parked in front of the house) was attacked by local people outraged by the crime.

name: Marquet FC de Lima
remarks: Marquet was found dead in a weir, in the agreste of Pernambuco. Her feet had been tied to a rock and she was naked with barbed wire wrapped around her neck. One suspect has been arrested and two others are being sought.

name: Kader Ataman
remarks: Kader was on her balcony when she was shot in the head. Two suspects have been taken into custody.

name: Brandi Seals
remarks: Brandi was shot dead in the street in the early hours of the morning. Like many trans women in the USA, she was reportedly undertaking sex work in order to fund medical treatment. Police have suggested Brandi was killed by someone after they realised she was a transgender woman.

name: Kebeca G. de Souza
remarks: Kebeca was a hairdresser. She was killed by two men who arrived on a motorcycle and shot her in the chest.

name: Rhiannon Layendecker
remarks: Rhiannon was murdered by her wife, apparently after an argument. Later that day she rang the emergency services and confessed to the crime. When the police arrived they found Rhiannon's body wrapped in a blanket in the back of her own truck. They also discovered her killer had planned to bury Layendecker at a home in Charlotte County, and that the hole had already been dug.The two women are both transgender and neighbors say they kept to themselves.

name: Canoa
remarks: According to police reports, Canoa was beaten by men who arrived on a motorcycle. When she fell to the ground they shot her 15 times in the head. According to information from local residents who knew her, she was not involved in drugs or crime. Police suspect that the crime was motivated by transphobia.

name: Larissa Paiva
remarks: Larissa was killed by four people in the North Zone of São Paulo, inside a hotel in Rua Voluntários da Pátria. An officer heard "loud bangs" coming from the garage of the establishment and, on coming down to see what happened, found her dead after being attacked by four people armed with wooden beams. The attackers have not yet been identified.

name: Rose
remarks: Rose was found dead inside an abandoned commercial building in the Bessa neighbourhood. Bloodied pieces of wood were found beside her body. Rose was known and well liked in the neighborhood, where she worked as a car-keeper in a mall.

name: Mahi
remarks: Mahi was allegedly taken to their home and beaten by four other transgender people after she had stolen money from them. They found her dead the following morning and attempted to conceal her death by dumping her body at night. All four have been arrested.

name: C. N.
remarks: C. N. was shot in the early hours of the morning. The news reports are sketchy, but state that she was a member of a lesbian, gay, bisexual, transsexual, transgender, transvestite and intersex (LGBTTTI) organisation.

name: Bebel
remarks: Bebel was stabbed. No other information is known.

name: Alloés Carvalho
remarks: Alloés died by suicide at dawn on Christmas Eve. Even in death, some were still misgendering him.

name: Devudamma Surya Narayana
remarks: Devudamma was found dead in her home. According to police reports she was electrocuted and a fire had started as a result of a short circuit, but foul play is suspected.

name: C.H. Camargo
remarks: C.H. was a hairdresser. Their body was found stabbed and partially burned in undergrowth. They had last been seen with a man at 10pm the previous evening.

name: Lorrany Oliveira ("Lhoane")
remarks: Lhoane was found dead on Boxing Day morning alongside the BA 120 highway. According to locals, Lhoane left Santaluz on Saturday afternoon with a man identified as Gemisson de Jesus Santos Silva, 21, known as "Tiririca". He was subsequently arrested and confessed to beating her with his fists and a bottle.

name: Erika Alexandra Londoño Noreña
remarks: Erika died as a result of a failed cosmetic surgery to enlarge her buttocks at a backstreet clinic. She died in a nearby hospital.

name: Marilyn Cipriany Guzmán
remarks: Marilyn was shot 3 times by a man on a motorcycle. She died at the scene. Marilyn was from Neiva (Huila) and had given an interview to La Patria de Manizales during Pride celebrations just a few months earlier.

name: Carolina Angulo Paredes ("Camila")
remarks: Carolina was shot in the chest by two men on a motorcycle. At the time she was working on the street near a service station in the early hours of the morning.

name: V. O. Silva
remarks: Victim was tortured.

name: Sonia Akter
remarks: The body of hijra Sonia was recovered by police from Nobbairasi bus stand in Morrelganj.

name: Reinaldo Oliveira ("Adrielly Reys")
remarks: Reinaldo was a drag artist. They had been missing for four days when their body was found beheaded in their bathroom. Police said there were bloodstains in the house and suspect that the murderer locked the front door to delay the discovery of the body.

name: Silvia Gomes Marques
remarks: Silvia was shot by two men on a motorcycle in the middle of a Sunday afternoon. Three days later Fany Diniz would be shot and killed in the same location.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The decomposing body of the victim was found with signs of torture.

name: Fany Diniz
remarks: Fany was shot dead by two men on a motorcycle at around 9 pm on Riachuelo Street in the Campina neighborhood of Belém. 3 days earlier another trans woman, Silvia Gomes Marques, had been killed at the same spot. Her murder was also attributed to two murderers on a motorcycle.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was one of two people tied up and stabbed by two men who broke into her apartment. The other person survived and was transferred to hospital but the victim died at the scene.

name: C. Sobral
remarks: C. was shot. No other information is known.

name: G. Carrera
remarks: G. was found dead at home, with multiple wounds.

name: Christa Leigh Steele-Knudslien
remarks: Christa was killed by her husband. She was found dead at her home by police on the evening of 5th January. Her husband confessed to striking her with a hammer and stabbing her with a knife, reportedly saying that he had "snapped" and done "something very bad" when interviewed by the police. Christa was well known in the local trans community and produced the Miss Trans New England pageant.

name: Kagiso Ishmael Maema ("Ousi Kagiso")
remarks: Ousi Kagiso's body was found dumped half naked in a stream on 6th January. She was partially covered with plastic and had wounds on her head and arm, which appeared to have been caused by an axe. It is also suspected that she was strangled. The previous evening she had been seen in a bar in the company of a man.

name: I. Y.
remarks: I. Y. was shot by an unidentified assailant on the night of 5th December. She was taken to hospital but died in the intensive care unit a month later. According to witnesses she worked in a casino and her killer argued with her before he shot her.

name: V. Peixoto
remarks: V. was beaten to death. Although original news reports described her as a man, a local support organisation confirmed that she was trans and that they had worked with her in the past.

name: Viccky Gutierrez
remarks:
Viccky's body was found burned in her apartment in the early hours of 10th January. Reports suggest that there was a smell of gasoline inside the property, and was speculated that she was killed before the fire was started.

On 17th January Kevyn Ramírez, 29, was arrested on charges of murder, arson and attempted theft. According to investigators, the suspect met the victim online. Then, on 10th January, he stabbed her to death, before setting fire to her home. According to the prosecution, the suspect admitted stabbing her.

name: Lourdes Reinoso
remarks: Lourdes  and her great aunt Francisca Ofelia Palacio, 80, were attacked with a knife by Lourdes' ex-partner. Both died from their injuries. Lourdes had moved back to Rio Nio (the town of her birth) to escape her abusive ex-partner. He allegedly travelled there in order to attack her.

name: Clóvis Figueiredo
remarks: Clóvis was a hairdresser. She was stabbed to death and robbed in her home.

name: Jessica González
remarks: Jessica was found dead on Tuesday 16th January 2018 two weeks after going missing.

name: Carol Alves
remarks: Carol was a sex worker. She was shot in the head in the early hours of the morning by a man who fled on a bicycle.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was stabbed and her body thrown from a moving vehicle. Her identity is unknown.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The decomposing body of an unidentified trans woman was found on 18 Jan 2018 at the bottom of a ravine on the edge of the Coetzala-Naranjal road.

name: Kelly
remarks: Kelly was shot. No other information is known.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was found dead in an abandoned residence on the outskirts of the city. She was naked and her face had been beaten.

name: Emilly Fogaça
remarks: Emily went missing on 21st January after going to the beach with colleagues. She was last seen with a man in a bar. Her body was found in an advanced state of decomposition on 1st February. Initial indications were that she had drowned. It is not known whether her death was accidental or the result of foul play.

name: Júlia de Arruda
remarks: Julia was stabbed to death and beheaded in her home on 21st January.

name: Lohane
remarks: Lohane was stabbed in the neck with a machete by her partner after an argument.

name: Tyty
remarks: TyTy was killed by MS-13 gang members while he was returning home from a wake. He died just a few blocks away from his home.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim had long hair, was wearing a blouse and short pants that were pure blood. Police haven't identified the victim.

name: Chelsy/Cristal Grisales Molina
remarks: Chelsy was shot in her living room by a gunman. She was originally from the municipality of Marseille, and a graduate of the Agricultural Institute. She had transitioned at 18 and although she lived alone had visited her family regularly.

name: Rios Dayane Macklarenn
city: São Bernardo do Campo, São Paulo
location: São Bernardo do Campo, São Paulo (Brazil)
remarks: Rios's decomposing body was found with stab wounds on 26th January. She had been missing since 7th January.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was shot inside a salon by an unidentified assailant from outside the building.

name: Paola Carranco
remarks: Paola had just got into a taxi when another car pulled alongside and a gunmen within it shot her fire times. The taxi driver was also shot, but survived.

name: Raquel Cosinele
remarks: Raquel's half-naked and bruised body was found in a ditch with stones and bloodstains scattered across the ground.

name: Silvana Pineda
remarks: Silvana was shot on Avenida Justo Capera in La Dorada. She died at the scene.

name: Blanca
remarks: Blanca was stabbed while working on the street. Their killer was arrested and is believed to have been a client.

name: Brigith
remarks: Victim was shot.

name: Vicky Julieth Alvarado
remarks: Vicky was beaten and stabbed with a broken bottle in the early hours of Sunday 28th January. She was 22, and had transitioned at 17.

name: Samira de Alcantara
city: Nossa Senhora do Socorro, Aracaju, Sergipe
location: Nossa Senhora do Socorro, Aracaju, Sergipe (Brazil)
remarks: Samira's body was found entangled in a fence on a side road near a motel. CCTV recorded that she had been pursued by her killers and became entangled in the fence where her body was found. She was killed with machete blows to her head and one of her legs.

name: Ynina
remarks: Yanina went missing and was later found murdered.

name: Anninha Ferreira Rochee ("Ana Carolini")
remarks: Ana's body was found naked, mutilated and beheaded on 7th February. She had been missing since 1st February when she went to work in Colatina.

name: Natália Ketlyn
remarks: Natália was killed in the street in Campos Altos. Witnesses saw her screaming for help while running from a man running chasing her making death threats. Shortly afterwards her body was found with a stone on top of her head and a wound in the region of the chest and ribs, probably caused by a firearm. Her purse and a black wig were found near her body, but the killer was not found or identified.

name: J. A. Marín Marín
remarks: Two trans women were robbed of a set of headphones by a pair of robbers. Both gave chase, but while tackling them one was stabbed in the heart. She died in hospital.

name: Celine Walker
remarks: Celine was shot dead in a hotel room. Initial news reports deadnamed and misgendered her.

name: Hemilly
remarks: Hemilly was drinking at a friend's house. When she went out to buy a drink, she was stabbed in the left armpit. A friend found her and took her back to the house she had left moments before, but she died due to the severity of the injuries. Before dying she identified her attacker.

name: Tonya Harvey ("Kita")
remarks: Tonya was shot in the street in late afternoon. Initial police and local news reports misgendered her.

name: Adriana Bonetto
remarks: Adriana's body was found inside her house with multiple stab wounds and wrapped in a bloody sheet.

name: A. da Silva Silvério
remarks: A. was shot in the head in the Maranhão neighborhood of Vitória de Santo Antão. She had only recently arrived in the city from São Paulo state.

name: Lohan
remarks: Lohan was a trans man. He was beaten to death in Vitoria on 8th February.

name: Milonga F. L. Martins
remarks: Milonga was shot on her doorstep by by two men on a motorcycle. According to relatives Milonga had been depressed after the loss of her mother and rarely left her house.

name: Dominique
remarks: Dominique's body was found wrapped in a rug on Saturday 10th February on a plot of land on the banks of the Córrego do óleo. She was half-naked and had deep cuts to the face and arm. She may also have been beaten.

name: Nayra Wynndyston
remarks: Nayra was shot 5 times.

name: Tatiana ("Tetris")
remarks: Tetris was stabbed in the street after an argument with another trans woman. She died in hospital.

name: Name Unknown
remarks:
The victim was shot by by two men on a motorcycle while working on Pompeu Vasconcelos street, in Ellery neighborhood.
She was hit in the back by two shots and fell into a bar. According to a witness three customers who were in the establishment ran away fearing that a robbery was in progress.

name: Zenith Campbell ("Zena")
remarks: Zena was strangled by her boyfriend. Her body was found in a car in the central suburb of Aro Valley at about 1pm on Sunday 11th February. Paddy Jonathan Woods, 30, has been arrested and charged with her murder. He had met her on a dating website a couple of months before. Her aunt told the media that the family had comforted the killer after her death, not knowing police suspected he was responsible for killing her.

name: Bruna
remarks: Bruna was shot. Two suspects have been arrested, but no other information is known.

name: Keila
remarks: Keila was shot twice by two men on a motorcycle in the Pituba neighborhood during the night of Monday 12th February. She was taken to hospital but died there of her injuries. A 26 year old cisgender woman was also shot in the same attack but survived.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was shot in the neck and died in hospital. According to another sex worker a client was responsible for the shooting.

name: Misheel Ruidias Fernández
remarks: Misheel was shot in the head during an argument at a party. At the time she was living in Spain and visiting Peru.

name: Bruna Ferrari
remarks: Bruna was stabbed in the street. Her killer was arrested. She was the second trans woman to be killed in the area in less than a month. The previous victim was an unidentified trans woman killed on 20th January. Activists suspect that an extermination group in Concordia do Pará is acting to kill gays and lesbians in the interior. "It was a death tied to homophobia. In less than a month they killed two trans there, and there is information that this group is acting strongly, "says the coordinator.

name: K. Silva
remarks: This was a particularly horrific attack. K. was thrown from a vehicle with feet and hands tied with tape and mouth gagged before being shot 27 times. According to witnesses her body showed signs of torture and so many gunshots hit her head that her face was left disfigured.

name: C. Antuán
remarks: C. was beaten and then shot. Her body found on an abandoned building in the San Martín de los Porres neighbourhood on the morning of 13th February.

name: Pérola
remarks: Pérola was a sex worker who was hired by an off duty policeman. Afterwards he refused to pay for her services afterwards and shot her dead.

name: Paloma
remarks: Paloma was admitted to hospital on 2nd February after a transphobic assault by a tenant in her building. She died in hospital from a stroke 12 days later. Paloma was a survivor of Pinochet's Chile.

name: Ekai Lersundi
remarks: Ekai died by suicide after the Gender Unit at Cruces Hospital failed to prescribe puberty blockers/hormone therapy.

name: Laysla Oliveira
remarks: Laysla was beaten to death at around 6am on on 17th February in a room at the Village Motel. Her killer fled the scene and attempted to drive along a railway line. He abandoned the car (which he had borrowed from his sister in law) when it became stuck. When finally arrested, he resorted to victim blaming.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was one of five women (three trans and two cis) shot dead on the road next to a burnt out car in an orchard.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was one of five women (three trans and two cis) shot dead on the road next to a burnt out car in an orchard.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was one of five people (three trans and two cis women) shot dead on the road next to a burnt out car in an orchard.

name: Amanda Rios
remarks: Amanda was shot and her body found on Jacarapé beach on the south coast of Joao Pessoa on the morning of 19th February.

name: Eduarda Brasil
remarks: Eduarda was found dead in the Belvedere Garden at dawn on Monday 19th February, without a bag or cell phone. She had no marks of violence on her body, but did have a bruise on the chin and minor abrasions on the arm and knee. The case was registered as a "suspicious death".

name: E. Carrell Ray
remarks:
E. Carrell Ray and her housemate Zakaria Fry went missing on 18th January. Bloodstains were found in their home. Note that Zakaria's sister identified E. Carrell Ray to be a non-transitioned transgender woman, but E. Carrell Ray's family denies this is the case.

On 31st January their case was classified as a homicide by detectives from the Albuquerque New Mexico Police Department, and on 19th February a Santa Fe rancher discovered one of the bodies in a garbage can on his ranch. Authorities reported that both victims were male but the witness claims the body he found (presumably this was Zakaria) was female. The second victim (presumably E. Carrell Ray) was found about 2 miles away. Both died from blunt force trauma to the head and face. On 1st March the police arrested arrested 32-year-old Charles Spiess and charged him with two counts of murder.

name: Zakaria Fry
remarks:
Zakaria and her housemate E. Carrell Ray went missing on 18th January. Bloodstains were found in their home. Note that Zakaria's sister identified E. Carrell Ray to be a non-transitioned transgender woman, but E. Carrell Ray's family denies this is the case.

On 31st January their case was classified as a homicide by detectives from the Albuquerque New Mexico Police Department, and on 19th February a Santa Fe rancher discovered one of the bodies in a garbage can on his ranch. Authorities reported that both victims were male but the witness claims the body he found (presumably this was Zakaria) was female. The second victim (presumably E. Carrell Ray) was found about 2 miles away. Both died from blunt force trauma to the head and face. On 1st March the police arrested arrested 32-year-old Charles Spiess and charged him with two counts of murder.

name: Rayana Ribeiro
remarks: Rayana was shot. No other information is known.

name: Cynthia Moreira
remarks: Cynthia's decomposed and partially dismembered body was found in grassland at the back of an uninhabited house. Her body was in such a state that she was not identified until 18th April. She had been missing since 14th February.

name: Bia Rocha
remarks: Bia was found dead under a viaduct.

name: Claudia Oliveira
remarks: Claudia was shot and killed by drug traffickers at Porto Velho, in São Gonçalo. According to local residents, a black car arrived with the her and another victim at around 10am. He was shot in one hand but managed to escape, but she was eventually executed.

name: Fernanda Caetano
remarks: Fernando's body was found in the municipality of Lapa in an advanced state of decomposition.

name: Phylicia Mitchell
remarks: Phylicia died after being shot in the chest about 6 p.m. inside her home. Police reports state that officers found her dead on the living room floor with one arm slumped on the couch. Gary Sanders, 36, was charged with aggravated murder in connection with her death.

name: Kimberlys Ochoa
remarks: Kimberlys was beaten and thrown into an open grave at Bella Vista Cemetery. After being discovered unconscious on the morning of Thursday 22nd February she was taken to hospital but died 2 days later. Kimberlys had transitioned when she was 15.

name: Fernanda Dias ("Pit")
remarks: Fernanda was shot multiple times from a passing vehicle. She was a hairdresser, and one of the reports suggests that she may have been killed in error.

name: Alessandra da Silva Alves
city: Campo Grande, Mato Grosso do Sul
location: Campo Grande, Mato Grosso do Sul (Brazil)
remarks: Alessandra was killed in a drive-by shooting in the early hours of 1st March 2018. Another trans woman named Nayara was also shot, but survived.

name: Shayene
remarks: The killers shot her from a car.

name: Palola
remarks: Palola's body was found amongst mangroves. She had been shot.

name: Malvina Paiva
remarks: Malvina was shot in the face from a passing jeep as she was walking down Los Samanes Avenue at 5am on Saturday 3rd March. She died at the scene.

name: Samielly Castro ("Margrella")
remarks: Samielly's body was found on waste ground and showed signs of beating and sexual violence.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was shot twice in her home in the Las Coloradas neighborhood.

name: Samantha
remarks: Samantha was found dead at home. The cause of her death is unknown.

name: Hope Verbeeck
remarks: Hope took her life on 6th March after writing a heartbreaking letter to her family. Despite explicitly stating that she wished to be remembered as a trans woman named Hope, a number of media outlets misgendered her and used her deadname.

name: Sol Gómez
remarks: Sol's burnt body was found in a landfill site in Recreo on 7th March 2018, but her identity was not confirmed until several days later.

name: Alexa Armero Sierra
remarks: Alexa was a stylist. She was stabbed in the neck by a visitor to her apartment.

name: Pâmela Tabete
remarks: Pamela was found dead near a dam in Sítio Serrote. Her face was disfigured and her body bruised. The stone used to kill her was found near her body.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The body of the victim was found with knife wounds a block from the Antiguo Cuscatlán Municipal Market. It is suspected that she was killed elsewhere and her body dumped where it was found. The only clue to her identity was a star tattoo on one of her legs.

name: Kristina
remarks: Kristina was found dead at 8am in in a flat in Beyoğlu, Istanbul. The previous night she had been at a nightclub and brought a man home with her. Neighbours claimed that they heard shouting coming from the flat during the night but did not call the police. The murder suspect was later arrested in Bursa after stabbing a taxi driver. Kristina was originally from Azerbaijan but had left 5 years ago because of the lack of acceptance from her family and the social violence she faced there.

name: Ximena Garcia
remarks: Ximena's decomposing body was found in Lake Nemi 30km south of Rome on 10th March. She had disappeared on 22nd January. Her husband is suspected of killing her.

name: Nefes
remarks: Nefes was strangled in her flat in the Kolej District of Ankara. She was found on the afternoon of 10th March in a sitting position by the door with a cable tied to both door knobs strangling her. There was a note for her mother found on the desk. At first sight her death appeared to be by suicide and her friends called the police immediately. However following testimony the police have ruled the death as suspicious.

name: Thalita Silva
remarks: Thalita owned a beauty salon. She was found dead with a stab wound to her neck in her home in the Vila Maria neighbourhood. Three people - among them her ex-boyfriend - have been arrested. According to relatives he is a drug user and associated with a criminal gang in the city.

name: Yamilet
remarks: Yamilet was assassinated by her partner with a bottle.

name: Sheila
remarks: Sheila was shot in the head in the early hours of Thursday 15th March while she was working in the historic centre of the city.

name: J. Oliveira da Silva
remarks: J. was talking to others in the Santa Clara neighbourhood when an assailant on a motorcycle shot her in the head. She died at the scene.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim's body was found floating in the water at Barão Beach, near the Cocotá boat station. Her body had been tied with ropes and her breasts had been removed. Her face also showed signs of violence and had gunshot wounds.

name: Jacob Whelan
remarks: Jacob was found hanged in his room at Cardiff University. He was on the waiting list for an NHS gender identity clinic and struggled with the delays involved. Gender identity clinic ("GIC") provision in the UK is extremely inadequate given the size of the trans population, resulting in long waiting lists (typically 18-24 months, and rising) for even a first appointment. During this period, no in-person support is offered and patients are basically left to cope on their own.

name: Naomi Hersi
remarks: Naomi was found with knife wounds at the Heathrow Palace guest house late on Sunday morning and was pronounced dead at the scene 30 minutes later. His girlfriend Natalie Darkowska, 18, (who helped him to try to conceal the crime) has been found guilty of perverting the course of justice and will be sentenced in November.

name: Bruna Gabriel
remarks: Bruna was one of two trans women executed by unknown assailants in a car at dawn on the BR-316 highway in Ananindeua. Both were sex workers working at their "point" when they were shot. Bruna tried to flee but her assailant chased her and shot her in the back. After falling to the ground, he shot her again.

name: N. Naza
remarks: N. was one of two trans women executed by unknown assailants in a car at dawn on the BR-316 highway in Ananindeua. Both were sex workers working at their "point" when they were shot.

name: Paola Oliveira
remarks: Paola was shot dead after an argument at a bus stop in front of a supermarket. Her murder was recorded by CCTV. The police suspect that the perpetrator was a client who had refused to pay for her services earlier and so (presumably) she had taken his phone instead. He approached her at the bus stop and when she refused to give it back to him he shot her.

name: D. A. P. Jiménez
remarks: D. was found dead in the street with multiple stab wounds.

name: Charly ("Flor del Campo")
remarks: Charly was found tortured, stabbed 15 times and beheaded at her home in the Santiago Tula neighborhood at dawn on Wednesday 21st March 2018.

name: Alanis Burgo
remarks: Alanis was strangled.

name: Giorginye Dias de Siqueira
remarks: Giorginye was shot in the head by two men who got out of a car, shot her and then fled. Witnesses reported that she lived on the street.

name: Name Unknown
city: São Leopoldo, Rio Grande do Sul
location: São Leopoldo, Rio Grande do Sul (Brazil)
remarks: The victim was shot dead. Her family forbade the broadcast of news reports about the killing.

name: Elif
remarks: Elif died after jumping from the balcony of her boyfriend's home. A friend who shared her thoughts about Elif, said she was constantly hurt by her family:

name: Daniela Santos
remarks: Daniela was killed by her abusive partner and his brother in her home in Ibicaraí, southern Bahia. She had bruises on her face caused by a blunt instrument as well as cuts to the arm caused by being punched. She died in hospital. Both men have been arrested and have confessed to the crime.

name: Ayaka Neko
remarks: Neko died by suicide after suffering transphobic abuse from her parents (and her father in particular) and struggling with depression. Neko had realised that she was female in 2016 and started hormone therapy. She attended university in Utah (USA), but was forced to terminate her studies and return home to China after her parents terminated her fees. After returning China, Neko lived in Shanghai until her parents found her and her father intimidated her into going back home to Yunnan with them. She finally escaped his abuse by dying by suicide several days after he forcibly enrolled her in a militarised training camp.

name: Cleide Aládio Zaramarine Neto
remarks: Cleide was beaten to death by a man inside a motel. The police suspect is that he beat Cleide to death after discovering that she was transgender. Investigations described the crime as "cruel and brutal" as a result of the amount of blood found in the room. Eduardo Abreu Ferreira, 27, was arrested for her murder on 6th April.

name: Hildo de Melo Matias
remarks: Hildo and a 47 year old were both shot in the street on the evening of Sunday 25th March. She died at the scene.

name: Lorena Molina López
remarks: Lorena was shot several times in the head by an unknown assailant in the El Carmen neighborhood at around 11:30pm. She died at the scene.

name: Amia Tyrae Berryman
remarks: Amia was found with gunshot injuries in the Shades Motel on Airline Highway. She died at the scene. Local media misgendered her.

name: Chutki
remarks: Chutki and her friend Aizaz were riding in a rickshaw when they were shot multiple times and killed by two gunmen on a motorcycle. Information from the local police and TransAction Pakistan suggests that Chutki might have been killed in error, the intended victim was a transgender activist named Chuti.

name: Eduarda Amaro ("Martha")
remarks: Eduarda was shot during a firefight in the Três Vendas neighborhood on 29th March.

name: Asu
remarks: Asu died by jumping from the roof of her home. According to her friends she had been depressed since her parents died.

name: Kim Schinaider
remarks: Kim died by suicide as a result of a gunshot wound to the head.

name: Chance Houle
remarks: Chance died by suicide on 31st  March after a long period of depression and bullying. His family published an obituary referring to him as female, saying that [he] had "experienced intense pain most people will never know" and said the last six months had been especially painful with "continual transition".

name: Nastya Sapayev
remarks: Nastya was beaten to death by a crowd of people on a Moscow street. She was in the city to visit a hospital for medical attention. Nobody identified her body and she was buried as a homeless person. The location of her grave is not known.

name: Sasha Wall
remarks: Sasha was found dead with gunshot wounds in her car on a rural road in Chesterfield County at 8:30am on Easter Sunday. She was discovered slumped over the wheel and police say her car was parked on the road, left running for nearly two hours as unknowing motorists drove past. As often happens, Wall has been misgendered and deadnamed by both the police and in numerous media reports.

name: Elvira Costa Ferreira
remarks: Elvira was kicked, punched and then stabbed to death on Pedro Mendes Vasconcelos Street in the Novo Maranguape neighborhood. Elvira lived alone and worked as a cleaner. About 15 days before her death she had posted to a social network about her life and the difficulties she faced.

name: Andressa Muda
remarks: Andressa was a hairdresser. Her burnt body was found underneath the Bridge of Barra de Macaé. The following month Maicon Micael Cerqueira Nascimento (19) was arrested for her murder after attempting to rob her home.

name: Yoselyn
remarks: Yoselyn was found with her head covered by a pillow and throat cut in a room of the Los Azahares hotel. Hotel staff found her bloodied corpse early in the morning when they came to service the room. According to witnesses she had arrived with a man in a taxi the previous night.

name: Benjamin de Jesus Sousa
remarks: Benjamin was stabbed in the back during a fight with a man he had accused of robbery.

name: Angra Alessandra Cupertino
remarks: Alessandra was stabbed in the neck and face inside her own home. Her purse and other personal items had been stolen.

name: Grechen Alina Lara García
remarks: Grechen's body was found naked in her bedroom. She had been strangled.

name: V. Alphonze
remarks: V. was kidnapped at knife point and later stabbed in the neck, chest, stomach and hands. Three men were subsequently arrested.

name: Millany Santos Figueiredo
remarks: Millany was found dead in her home by her mother. Her body was covered in blood and she had been suffocated.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The body of the victim had signs of torture.

name: Nati da Silva ("Ivi")
remarks: Nati was shot by the driver of a car in the centre of Lajeado at around 7:50pm on Friday 20th April.

name: Nycoly Souza Nardoni Bhals
remarks: Nycoli was shot in the neck in the early hours of 22nd April.

name: Chanchal
remarks: Chanchal was shot dead by unidentified assailants in an auto-rickshaw. Police arrested two brothers in connection with the murder. One died in custody, and as a result a sub-inspector and several police officers were charged for the illegal detention and torture of a murder suspect which allegedly led to his death.

name: Brisa
remarks: Brisa was murdered by a taxer, allegedly for resisting sexual aggression.

name: Sheena
remarks: Sheena was asleep in her room in Kalu Khan (a village on the main Mardan-Swabi road) when two unidentified men broke in, beat her and then shot her 5 times. Her killing was reported by Trans Action Pakistan as the 56th murder of a transgender person in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa since 2015.

name: Alejandra Torres Torres
remarks: Alejandra was stabbed in the street during a fight following a party. She died before reaching hospital.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was stabbed in multiple places.

name: Christina Bentley
remarks: Chrissi died by suicide. She was a volunteer for Trans Pride Brighton and My Genderation as well as running  the Tumblr Trans Teen Survival Guide.

name: China Colón
remarks: China was a hairdresser. She was shot multiple times in an overgrown lot of the La Luz neighborhood. Her body was found by a neighbour.

name: Lydia Stone
remarks: Lydia died by suicide. No other details are known.

name: Taliana Rodríguez Rómulo
remarks: Taliana was a hairdresser. She died after suffering an allergic reaction following an injection, possibly of an industrial grade silicone filler. Many women in Latin America use industrial silicone for this purpose, and it can be deadly.

name: Arturo
city: Colonia Villa de los Belenes, Zapopan, Jalisco
location: Colonia Villa de los Belenes, Zapopan, Jalisco (Mexico)
remarks: Arturo was found dead at the entrance to a field. A rock had been dropped on her head and four bullet casings were found nearby.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was found shot dead in the La Laja neighborhood of Acapulco at around 8am.

name: Alan Bernnet
remarks: Alan was reportedly a drag artist. He and his friend Carlos Lamartine were both found murdered inside a residence. Their deaths sparked protest about their deaths and against homophobia in the city.

name: Gabriely Fancciny
remarks: Gabriely's naked body was found in her apartment in the Central region of Porto Velho. She had been stabbed 25 times. The knife used to kill her was found at the scene. On Wednesday 23rd May A 23 year old man was apprehended for her murder.

name: Grayson
remarks: Grayson died by suicide. No other details are known.

name: Matheus Passareli
remarks: Matheus was a non-binary LGBT activist and arts student. They were executed and burned after entering a favela in Piedade in the North Zone of Rio.

name: Paulinha
remarks: Paulinha was shot by a man on a motorcycle on Perimetral Avenue during the night of Monday 30th April. According to the police she may have been chased before being shot. Friends reported that several days earlier she and others in the area had been threatened.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: Victim was shot.

name: Bianca Santos Albuquerque
remarks: Bianca's half-naked body was found at a bus stop on Bernardo Coutinho Road, close to the entrance to the Vista Alegre neighborhood. She had been shot.

name: Rauanna Silva Gerbelly
remarks: Ruanna was shot by a passing group of men while she was standing by the road at the bottom of a hill.

name: Muni
remarks: Muni was shot in the head after an argument with a man at an engagement ceremony in Kotkay (northeast of Mansehra). Her alleged killer was handed over to the police by locals but witnesses claim that the police helped him to escape. Muni's murder was reported to be the 57th in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa since 2015.

name: Thalía
remarks: Thalia died by suicide.

name: Manju
remarks: Manju was found murdered in her rented room. Her husband Salman (with whom she lived) is on the run.

name: C. Alves
remarks: C. was shot dead in the street on Paramirim Avenue in the Patagonia Neighborhood on the morning of Tuesday 8th May.

name: Karla Patricia Flores-Pavon
remarks: Police officers discovered Karla's body in her apartment on Wednesday 9th May.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The body of a black transgender woman was found floating in the water at White Rock Creek on Saturday 12th May. The body was discovered by a kayaker and found in a "severe stage of decomposition," according to the Dallas police. Investigators ruled the death as unexplained pending a determination from the medical examiner's office. Deputy Police Chief Thomas Castro said during a news conference that some injuries were found on the body, but he did not specify their nature. They are currently calling her death "unexplained." Several days earlier Karla Patricia Flores-Pavo had been found strangled in her North Dallas apartment. Castro said they did not believe the two cases were related.

name: Isabel Borja Suárez
city: Venus del Río Quevedo, Los Rios
location: Venus del Río Quevedo, Los Rios (Ecuador)
remarks: Isabel was a stylist. She was stabbed to death in her salon in the early hours of Sunday 13th May. Eight days earlier her boyfriend had threatened to kill her.

name: Nino Fortson
remarks: Nino was shot at around 1:53am on Sunday 13th May at an address in Woods Drive in Northwest Atlanta. Police who were on a traffic stop nearby found him after hearing gunshots. He was taken to hospital but did not survive.

name: Roxana Hernández
remarks: Roxanna died from medical complications due to pneumonia while in the custody of US Immigration Customs Enforcement (ICE). She was being held at the privately run Cibola Correctional Facility in Milan, New Mexico. It has been repeatedly reported that asylum seekers at the border are held in freezing holding cells (often referred to as "hieleras") for days. Cibola is a facility for male inmates, which also suggests abusive behaviour by the authorities.

name: Rosada Durán Romero
remarks: Rosada was a sex worker. She was shot on the street at around 9pm on Monday 14th May 2018. After arriving in hospital she named her attacker. She died there after suffering a convulsion and falling from a stretcher.

name: Lucky Salavuki
remarks: Lucky was found lying in a pool of blood on the Suva foreshore in May and that she had died from massive head injuries after a blunt force trauma.

name: Myrella Mhell
remarks: Myrella was shot. No other details are known.

name: C. Peralta ("Pandora")
city: Santa Rita, Rio Grande do Sul
location: Santa Rita, Rio Grande do Sul (Brazil)
remarks: Pandora was a hairdresser. They were shot 5 times late on Monday 21st May in the Alto das Populares neighborhood. According to police, Pandora was visiting a friend and attending a party in the same neighborhood, when gang members invaded the area, dragged out the hairdresser and shot them dead.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The body was found on one side of the road, dead by suffocation.

name: Gigi Pierce
remarks: Gigi was shot on the sidewalk on Southwest 2nd Avenue sometime before 11:08pm on Monday 21st May 2018. She died at the scene. Sophia Adler (33) has been arrested and charged with murder. According to friends Gigi was in the early stages of transition, and was homeless at the time of her murder.

name: Yamileth Quintero
remarks: Yamileth was shot 4 times in the head at around 8pm near the perimeter fence of Culiacán International Airport. She died in hospital.

name: Beatriz Ribeiro
remarks: Beatriz was stabbed multiple times by a group of at least five people. She tried to run but the killers kept stabbing her. Antonio Aragão Ramos da Silva Júnior was arrested and confessed to partipating in her murder. On 17th August, the Civil Police also issued a warrant of pre-trial detention against Ronilson de Oliveira Costa, 18.

name: D. R. C.
remarks: D.R.C. was a clerk. She was found beaten to death on the banks of a highway in Jundiaí on 25 May after accepting a lift home.

name: Maritza Harrera
remarks: Maritza was stabbed in the body and neck in her salon on Melchor Ocampo street at around 8pm on Friday 25th May. Witnesses reported that student had entered the premises and attacked her. She was a stylist and also a DJ who presented on the local TV station Canal 12:

name: Chandraiah
remarks: A group of trans women were attacked by a mob who believed they were part of a gang planning to kidnap children, based on WhatsApp rumours. One of the women (named as Chandraiah in reports seen so far) died in hospital of her injuries.

name: I. Silva
remarks: I. was shot 7 times in front of the beverage stall where he worked.

name: S. Antolli
remarks: S. was stabbed in the street by her partner after an argument at 4am on 29th May 2018. Witnesses reported that her killer is an MS13 gang member.

name: Marty Dragonova
remarks:
Marty died by overdosing on caffeine drinks and tablets. A coroner said it was clear that he intended to take his own life. He was pronounced dead at 2am on Wednesday 30th May. Marty was originally from Sofia in Bulgaria and had been studying English and French literature at Cardiff University. He had been diagnosed with gender dysphoria by a GP in 2017 and referred to an NHS gender identity clinic.

It is not known whether NHS waiting lists, treatment delays or the way he was treated by clinicians contributed to his suicide, but sadly this has to be a distinct possibility - two months earlier Jacob Whelan had died by suicide in the same city after struggling with long NHS treatment delays.

name: Nayra Matos
remarks: Nayra's body was found on a public road after locals heard gunfire. 14 shell casings were found nearby.

name: Patrícia Pereira
remarks: Patricia was a janitor. Some reports say she was shot by two men inside her home, and others that she was shot by a man on a bicycle just outside her home.

name: Antash'a English
remarks: Antash'a was found between two abandoned homes with gunshot wounds. She died in hospital.

name: Adrielly Oliveira
remarks: Adrielly died after a cosmetic procedure involving industrial grade silicone injections.

name: Britney Vaz
remarks: Britney was an entrepreneur and businesswoman who ran her own bar ("Bar da Britney", or "Britney's Bar"). She was shot at the door of her own bar in the early hours of 3rd June 2018. Police were called by witnesses who heard gunshots, but unfortunately she died at the scene.

name: Vitória
remarks: Vitória was shot dead on Rua Boa Esperança in the Alto Peru neighborhood. According to police she was executed by gang members.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was shot in the head at around 3am on Wednesday 6th June inside the Mutirão Fair in the northern zone of Manaus.

name: Kamylla Roberta
remarks: Kamylla was found beaten to death with an iron bar in her home in the north of Santa Catarina Island. She had only moved there a month earlier. Police arrested a suspect the following month.

name: Fernanda Reichert
city: São Leopoldo, Rio Grande do Sul
location: São Leopoldo, Rio Grande do Sul (Brazil)
remarks: Fernanda was a beautician. She was found dead with knife wounds to her face and neck inside her home in the Sao Miguel neighborhood at around 5pm on Saturday 9th June. One of her arms had also been tied.

name: Tyfanny Montel
remarks: Tyfanny was found dead at dawn on Sunday 10th June at Rua Carmelo in the Pintolândia neighborhood. She had been stabbed in the chest and arm. According to family and witnesses she had moved there less than two weeks earlier and was working in a bar on the street where the murder occurred.

name: J. Martínez Cepeda
remarks: The victim was asfixiated and hit with a rock.

name: J. G. Romero Ortiz
location: San Sebastián Salitrillo, Santa Ana (El Salvador)
remarks: J.'s body was found inside a plastic bag buried in the garden of a residence on 14th June. She had been reported missing on 3rd June. They had been shot. Their partner is suspected of being responsible for the crime.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was found shot in the head in El Olimpo at around 7:40pm on Thursday 14th June. Her identity is unknown.

name: Jessica Mattos
city: Venâncio Aires, Rio Grande do Sul
location: Venâncio Aires, Rio Grande do Sul (Brazil)
remarks: Jessica's body was found by her sister with her head trapped in a window of an abandoned house at Rua Três, in Battisti neighborhood. She died by asphyxiation. According to relatives, she slept in the abandoned house and used the window to get in and out of the property. As such her death was probably accidental, but also a result of the circumstances she found herself in. Grupo Gay da Bahia (who record deaths of LGBTQ+ people in Brazil) list her cause of death as "cultural transphobia".

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was found handcuffed and beaten.

name: Robertha Sousa
remarks: Robertha was a hairdresser. She died from cardiorespiratory arrest after a cosmetic procedure which involved injecting industrial silicone.

name: Diamond Stephens
remarks: Diamond was found dead inside a crashed van in Meridian, Mississippi (USA) on 18th June 2018. She had been shot in the back of the head. According to local media, family members said that she was driving home to get ready for work when she was killed. She was not identified as transgender until late the following month.

name: Daniela Gutiérrez
city: Santiago del Estero, Santiago del Estero
location: Santiago del Estero, Santiago del Estero (Argentina)
remarks: Daniela died as a result of an illness left untreated because the local hospital refused to admit her. She was found dead in a residence on 19th June. Agencia Presentes report her cause of death as "social transvesticide".

name: Agatha Gomes
remarks: Agatha was a manicurist. She was shot 9 times in Heliopolis Square in the early hours of Sunday 19th June. She died in hospital after undergoing 12 hours of surgery in an attempt to save her life. Three days earlier she had shared video footage of a thief who had stolen her motorbike. It is not known whether he was connected with her death.

name: Nataly Briyith Sánchez
remarks: Nataly was murdered by a client inside her home. Her killer was arrested for the crime.

name: Chloe Sagal
remarks: Chloe died by suicide in a park in downtown Portland.

name: Juliana Araújo
remarks: Juliana died by suicide.

name: Thalia Costa Barboza
city: São Borja, Rio Grande do Sul
location: São Borja, Rio Grande do Sul (Brazil)
remarks: Thalia was beaten to death by her partner after he objected to her sharing the fact that they were in a relationship on social media. Douglas Gluszsazk Rodrigues, 22, was arrested after being identified through CCTV footage and confessed to the crime.

name: Nikolly Silva
remarks: Nikoly was stoned to death at dawn on Friday 22nd June. Her body was found in a backstreet behind the Maria Quitéria Municipal School at the intersection of Travessa R and U Street in the Tamoios neighborhood of the municipality of Cabo Frio.

name: Gaby Scheifer
remarks: Gaby was shot her in the face, arm and fingers on Saturday 23rd June. While trying to escape she was hit and killed by a vehicle.

name: Katty
remarks: Katty was shot dead in a bar called Guingue located in the neighborhood of Santiago in the municipality of Yautepec. According to witnesses, her killers burst into the bar at around 8pm, shot her multiple times and then left without saying a word. She died at the scene.

name: Cathalina Christina James
remarks: Cathalina was found shot dead in the Quality Inn in the Baymeadows area of Jacksonville. Her shooting was the fourth in Jacksonville in 2018, and the third death after Celine Walker and Antash'a English. The only information so far concerning a possible suspect in this murder case is that a male was spotted driving a beige vehicle.

name: Keisha Wells
remarks: Keisha was found dead with a gunshot wound to the abdomen in the parking lot of an apartment complex. Eleven bullet casings were found at the scene, according to police reports. She had no identification with her at the time, which caused investigators issues in identifying her, police said. According to the Human Rights Campaign Keisha was the second transgender woman to be killed in Cleveland in 2018 (the first was Phylicia Mitchell on 24th February) and the 13th known transgender person to be killed in the USA.

name: Bruna da Conceição
remarks: Bruna was shot dead in the Bairro Novo Horizonte municipality of Lagarto on the night of Monday 25th June.

name: Índia da Silva Pellegrine
remarks: Índia was shot in the foot and head  at round 5:30am while running away from her killer in the Campinas de Brotas neighborhood.

name: Dr Laura Masi
remarks: Laura was a doctor specialising in psychiatry and neurology. She died by suicide. In death her identity was erased by family and she was buried "as a man".

name: Carla Croft
remarks: Carla was robbed and shot dead in the Pajeu neighborhood of Pacajus. She died in hospital.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: No details are known. This case is one of 6 killings in the area identified by the Diana Sacayan organisation.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: No details are known. This case is one of 6 killings in the area identified by the Diana Sacayan organisation.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: No details are known. This case is one of 6 killings in the area identified by the Diana Sacayan organisation.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: No details are known. This case is one of 6 killings in the area identified by the Diana Sacayan organisation.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: No details are known. This case is one of 6 killings in the area identified by the Diana Sacayan organisation.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: No details are known. This case is one of 6 killings in the area identified by the Diana Sacayan organisation.

name: Alexa Gutiérrez
remarks: Alexa was stabbed and beaten to death inside her home. Her sister found her body several days after she had been killed. Alexa was a stylist who was in the early stages of transition and was fighting cancer at the same time. She was well known in the area and visited local communities to offer free haircuts to people who could not afford to pay for her services.

name: Daine Grey
remarks: Daine died by suicide. His parents disowned him and refused to claim his body. A Gofundme page was set up to cover funeral expenses and raised over $17,000 in less than 40 hours.

name: Deepa
remarks: Deepa was stabbed to death. Although she had been attacked before, this time it proved fatal.

name: Mirela
remarks: Mirela's body was found on the afternoon of 4th July beneath a pile of debris in a vacant lot adjacent to a repair shop. She had cuts on her neck and had been strangled with the strap of a handbag. Investigators believe that she may have been killed by a client at the end of their meeting.

name: Shirley dos Santos
remarks: Shirley was shot dead in the Várzea neighborhood of Recife.

name: Michele Silveira
remarks: Michele was shot dead on late at night by two men on a motorcycle.

name: Fernanda da Biz
city: Rio Brilhante, Mato Grosso do Sul
location: Rio Brilhante, Mato Grosso do Sul (Brazil)
remarks: Fernanda was hit over the head several times and stabbed more than 20 times. Her head was crushed and her face torn. Police believe that her killing took place between midnight and 1 am.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The victim was found with continuous blows in the head.

name: Adri Adelý Jurado
remarks: Adri was stabbed in the abdomen with a kitchen knife by a client who came to the establishment where she worked with other sex workers on 12 de Octubre Avenue. A 22 year old man has been arrested. Her murder is being treated as femicide as Adri carried identity documents congruent with her identity.

name: Aisha Albuquerque
remarks: Aisha was beaten to death inside an abandoned house in the Boqueirão neighborhood of Curitiba, late on the morning of Friday 13th July. She was found by neighbours after they heard an argument and cries for help. According to the Civil Police, the crime scene is an abandoned house used by drug users on Simão Kossobudski street.

name: Simge Avc?
remarks: Simge was shot in the stomach by her boyfriend at her home in the Ilkadim district. He defended his actions by claiming that she had "mocked his manhood". He has been arrested for her killing.

name: Chanel
remarks: Chanel was shot dead at midnight on Sunday 15th July by unknown assailants while working on Alexander Von Humboldt Avenue. She died in an ambulance on the way to hospital.

name: L. M. Cocom Guzmán
remarks: L. was found gagged with her hands tied. She had been strangled with her own clothing.

name: Lay Neves de Santana
remarks: Lay was shot in the chest early on Monday 16th July during an attempted robbery by two men on a motorcycle. She died in hospital.

name: A. Sis
remarks: Individuals attacked the victim who was working as a cashier.

name: Daniela Cica Duarte
remarks: Daniela was shot in the face and chest by two men on a motorcycle at around 10:30pm on Santana Street in Gurupi.

name: Sasha Garden
remarks: Sasha's body was found naked behind an apartment complex in Orlando, Florida (USA) on 19 Jul 2018. Investigators have not said how Garden was killed, only that there was trauma to her body.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: Victim was shot.

name: Sania
remarks: Sania was shot dead at a wedding in the Chiniya Nawali area of Hafizabad on Friday 20th July. She was one of several trans women engaged as dancers at a wedding party. When one of the guests made unwelcome sexual advances and the group objected, he pulled a gun and shot Sania dead.

name: M. L. Brites
remarks: M. L. Brites was found dead on Sunday 22nd July 2018 in an umbanda temple on 200 Olegario Andrade, Pilar Centro. She had been dead for at least four days. The cause of her death was not reported.

name: Alexa Martinez
remarks: Alexa was murdered on the morning of Sunday 22nd July after attending a concert. Her death was caused by trauma to the head. According to witnesses, on Saturday night she had left her house with friends to go to a Pancho Barraza concert held at the Silao Fair 2018 (http://fiestasmexicanas.info/feria-de-silao-2018/). She was last seen at dawn on Sunday in the downtown area of the city. Her body was found the next day by municipal police officers alongside the Silao-Guanajuato highway.

name: Paola Villefort
remarks: Paola was found stabbed to death late on the morning of Monday 23rd July 2018 in the village of Capivari dos Eleotérios, which links Araújos to Nova Serrana, Minas Gerais. Paola lived in Patrocínio and had taken part in the local Pride event there on 15th July.

name: Daiane Souza
city: Porto Alegre, Rio Grande do Sul
location: Porto Alegre, Rio Grande do Sul (Brazil)
remarks: Daiane was shot dead in the Restinga neighborhood on the night of Wednesday 25th July. According to witnesses, an intense firefight took place at around  11pm on Silvio Sirângelo street. Upon arriving at the scene police found the victim dead from gunshot wounds.

name: Alaska Bout
remarks: Alaska was found half naked and dead on the banks of the River Bobos with barbed wire around her neck. Her body showed signs of torture.

name: Gaby Arantes
remarks: Gaby was robbed and beaten to death with an iron bar by a client who refused to pay her. His photo was circulated on Facebook. Police are asking for information which may lead to the arrest of the suspect.

name: Louise
remarks: Louise was a student who died by suicide. No other details are known.

name: Linda
remarks: Linda's body was found in the street with a bag over her head.

name: Dalila de Oliveira
remarks: Dalila died by hanging with a sheet in a prison bathroom. She was a Brazilian sex worker who had only just arrived in the prison after being arrested for robbery.

name: Dudu dos Santos
remarks: Dudu was a police officer. He went missing on the evening of 2nd August amid reports by friends that he had been injured in a bar. Reportedly he had gone there to celebrate the birth of the baby of a couple of friends.

name: Sylva
remarks: Sylva was an asylum seeker who had been detained for a year. She died in custody on 4th August 2018 in the men's wing of a Direct Provision centre in Galway.

name: Lalesca d'Capory
remarks: Lalesca's body was found floating in the sea by fishermen near a beach in the Rio Vermelho neighborhood in the early hours of Sunday 5th August. Her cause of death was reported by the police as drowning, but family members who identified her body verified that she had a cut in her neck which leads them to believe that she was murdered. Most news reports reported her body as being that of a man.

name: Paloma Ferreira
remarks: Paloma was shot in the street by two men on a motorcycle on the night of Monday 6th August. She worked as a street food seller nearby. According to witnesses, two men on a motorcycle approached her just after she had finished packing down her stall for the day. One of them pulled out a revolver and shot at her several times. She tried to run, but was hit along with an elderly man who was on the sidewalk nearby. The suspects fled. Paloma was rushed to hospital by her husband, but died there. The elderly man is in a stable condition.

name: Lucie-Anne Roux
remarks: Lucie-Anne died by suicide. She was a police officer, and unfortunately her family were not supportive of her transition. She had left the home where she lived with her family two years earlier.

name: M.R.M.
remarks: M. was found shot dead on a dirt road. Her body was identified by her family. Her sister reported that she worked in a salon as a hairdresser.

name: Paolla Blayton ("Lelê")
city: Campos dos Goytacazes, Rio de Janeiro
location: Campos dos Goytacazes, Rio de Janeiro (Brazil)
remarks: Paolla was shot in the street on the afternoon of Tuesday 7th August near her home in Codin neighborhood, in the Guarus area of Campos. She died at the scene.

name: Casey Hoke
remarks: Casey was an artist, activist and national public speaker. He died at home on Wednesday 8th August. His brother told the Los Angeles Blade that "Casey lost his battle with mental illness."

name: Karlla da Silva Balbino
remarks: Karlla was found dead on the morning of Thursday 9th August beneath a mango tree near the BR-116 highway in Caratinga. She had been shot in the chest and back and also had marks to the neck indicative of strangulation. DNA testing is being carried out in an attempt to identify skin residues found beneath her nails.

name: Rafael Romeu de Brito
remarks: Rafael died by suicide.

name: Tânia Lopes
remarks: Tânia was shot on the morning of Friday 10th August by two men who knocked on the door of her home. They fled on a motorcycle.

name: Abril Natasha Quiñónez
remarks: Abril was shot dead as she was walking down the street in the Alto Nápoles neighborhood at around 11:30am on Saturday 11th August.

name: Renata
remarks: Renata was shot dead by two men in the early hours of Sunday 12th August in the center of Cabo de Santo Agostinho.

name: J.C.M.
remarks: J. was shot in the chest. Her body was found on a dirt road. Her body was identified by her family but only the initials of her deadname are known.

name: Krispim Souza de Araujo
remarks: Krispim was attacked by two men during an attempted robbery while working alongside the BR 304 highway on 28th July. She tried to run but was shot 3 times. She was taken to hospital but died just over two weeks later on 13th August.

name: Name Unknown
remarks: The body of the victim was found in the street by local children on Tuesday 14th August 2018. She had been tied with duct tape and her body showed signs of torture. In death local news reports described her only as "muerto vestido de mujer" ("a dead man dressed as a woman"), which usually means the victim was a trans woman.

name: Lili Chirinos Carrillo
remarks: Lili was shot in the face by two men on a motorcycle near Alfonso López Pumarejo airport. She died instantly.

name: Nasir Nazo
